body_html:
you have a mix of pytorch-nightly and pytorch packages, maybe because of installing a library after installing pytorch-nightly that installed pytorch 0.4.1.

Do this:

conda uninstall -y pytorch-nightly
conda uninstall -y pytorch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

conda install -y pytorch-nightly
body_text:
you have a mix of pytorch-nightly and pytorch packages, maybe because of installing a library after installing pytorch-nightly that installed pytorch 0.4.1.
Do this:
conda uninstall -y pytorch-nightly
conda uninstall -y pytorch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

conda install -y pytorch-nightly
body:
you have a mix of pytorch-nightly and pytorch packages, maybe because of installing a library after installing pytorch-nightly that installed pytorch 0.4.1.

Do this:

```
conda uninstall -y pytorch-nightly
conda uninstall -y pytorch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

conda install -y pytorch-nightly
```
